content.text: Hi, I'm Connor, what's your name?
Hi Connor, I'm Jessica.
Nice to meet you, Jessica! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, and I also cosplay with my husband. We've been together for 5 years.
That's awesome! I love to read as well. What are some of your favorite books?
I love anything by Stephen King. He's my favorite author.
I've read a few of his books, but I've never read anything by him that I didn't like.
Have you read the Dark Tower series?
No, I haven't. Is it good?
It's one of my favorites. It's a long series, but it's worth it.
I'll have to check it out.
You won't regret it. So, what are you doing tonight?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe I'll watch a movie or something.
I'm going to a soccer game with my husband.
That sounds fun. I love soccer. Do you guys go to a lot of games?
Yeah, we try to go to as many as we can.
Awesome. I wish I could go to a game with you.
You should come with us sometime.
I'd love to.
Great! We'll have to make plans sometime
